remarks: The group sum of transpositions of a finite set is a permutation, see also ~ psgneldm2i .  (Contributed by AV, 19-Jan-2019.)
statement:
gsmtrcl.s $e |- S = ( SymGrp ` N ) $.
gsmtrcl.b $e |- B = ( Base ` S ) $.
gsmtrcl.t $e |- T = ran ( pmTrsp ` N ) $.
gsmtrcl $p |- ( ( N e. Fin /\ W e. Word T ) -> ( S gsum W ) e. B ) $.
